title: Crashing After Champion Select (patch 6.24)
body:
Every time when i go in champion select and pick a champion i get a black screen for like 5 seconds following up with a popup error saying:

˝Please go check your network connection and try to reconnect to the game˝
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

I tried some of the tips n' tricks from youtube but it still doesnt work and for some reason my desktop icon changed aswell:

Riot Repair
DNS server refresh
Setting the app to windows 7
running as Admin
ports(which compleatly ruined my internet so i stopped that right away)

Can you please give me some tips to try and fix it?

replies.body: Ok i will try them out ty for the help!

Black screens are usually caused by a network problem failing to reach or hold a strong connection with the game server.  I know you've taken some steps already, but I recommend going over every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
